privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section_text_1: The Privacy Policy informs you about the use we make of personal data collected through our website www.successtudy.net. AMBITION STUDY is committed to protecting and respecting your privacy in accordance with the rules on the protection of personal data, such as those arising from the amended Community Directive 95/46/EC. Our privacy policy applies to all visitors and customers over 18 years of age who use our website. Our privacy policy may change at any time. Please check the latest updates regularly.
privacy.section_text_2: We may collect the following personal data about you: Name, First Name, Phone Number, Email Address, Postal Address. This personal data is collected in the following cases: You request contact with our agency on our website. You access and browse our website.
privacy.section_text_3: We use the information about you to contact you and respond to your requests.
privacy.section_text_4: Our website uses cookies to collect information. Cookies (or trackers) are data files placed on a computer, mobile or any device (such as smartphones or tablets) when you browse our website.
privacy.section_text_5: All information you provide to us is stored on our secure server.
privacy.section_text_6: You can contact us at this address: contact@successtudy.net or via our online form accessible on our website at the 'contact' page.
